attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people demand a general election; labour is failing us in all aspects, the economy, terrorism, NHS, transport, price of fuel, the EU referundum, immigration, crime the list is endless
We demand the right to have our say on the running of this country with a properly elected Prime Minister

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
